title: Steed + Mrs Peel: The Golden Game 01-06 (of 6|1990/2012|MM-DTs)
description:
NOTE: (*Takes a deep breath*) These are the Minutemen-DTs releases of Boom Studios' early-2012 6-issue re-release of Eclipse Books' 1990 3-issue run of "Steed and Mrs Peel", written by Morrison and Caulfield and illustrated by Gibson.

These are NOT the same issues as those digitally released as "Steed and Mrs. Peel 001-006" by Fawkes-Empire, which represent the first 6 issues of Boom Studios' original 11-issue run, starting in late 2012, written by Waid and Monroe.

Unfortunately, that distinction is all but invisible in the release tags.

---

Steed and Mrs. Peel [I] (2012) - #1-#4 - "The Golden Game, Part One-Four"
                                 #5-#6 - "Deadly Rainbow,  Part One-Two"

Boom! Studios | Boom! Entertainment, Inc.	

Writer(s):                             Grant Morrison, Anne Caulfield
Penciller(s), Inker(s), Colorist(s):   Ian Gibson
Letterer(s):                           Ellie De Ville
Editor(s):                             Bryce Carlson, Chris Rosa

Cover Date:                            January-June 2012
Cover Price:                           US $3.99
Format:                                Color; Standard Comic Issue; 28 pages
